00001 package ScheatorDb;
00002 import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
00003 import java.lang.reflect.Field;
00004 
00013 public abstract class DbObject<Object, T> {
00014     LinkedHashMap<Object, T> list;
00015     AbstractDb db;
00016     int currentId;
00017 
00018     enum FieldState {SAVED, NEW, CHANGED}
00019 
00025     public abstract void fetch(int key);
00026 
00031     public LinkedHashMap<Object, T> getList() {
00032         return list;
00033     }
00034 
00040     public T getItemByIndex(Object index) {
00041         return list.get(index);
00042     }
00043 
00050     abstract public class Data {
00051 
00053         Integer field_id;
00055         String field_name;
00056 
00057         FieldState state = FieldState.SAVED;
00058 
00059         @Override
00060         public String toString() {
00061             return field_name;
00062         }
00063 
00072         public void set(String field, Object value) {
00073             String name = "field_".concat(field);
00074             try {
00075                 Class c = Class.forName(this.toString());
00076                 Field f = c.getField(name);
00077                 f.set(this, value);
00078             } catch (Exception e) {
00079                 System.err.println("Field does not exist: " + name + "(" + e.getMessage() + ")");
00080             }
00081             if (state == FieldState.SAVED) {
00082                 state = FieldState.CHANGED;
00083             }
00084         }
00085 
00094         public Object get(String field) {
00095             String name = "field_".concat(field);
00096             Object retval = null;
00097             try {
00098                 Class c = Class.forName(this.toString());
00099                 Field f = c.getField(name);
00100                 retval = (Object)f.get(this);
00101             } catch (Exception e) {
00102                 System.err.println("Field does not exist: " + name + " (" + e.getMessage() + ")");
00103             }
00104             return retval;
00105         }
00106 
00107     }
